Headline: #18 16th-18th Temporary Reroute at 18th/Blue Island
ShortDescription: 18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#18 16th-18th buses are temporarily rerouted via 18th, Ashland, Cermak, Loomis and 16th: due to, street blockage near 18th/Blue Island.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between 95th and Garfield
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Garfield due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 95th and Garfield due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and Garfield at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Garfield and 95th/Dan Ryan to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
